justification: Asking Tier 1 WR Jordan Rivera for Tier 4 RB Liam Torres is unbalanced. While Team B values committee RBs and playoff schedules, they also trust consensus and wouldn’t swap a cornerstone WR for depth. B’s 7-1 team may want RB depth, but Rivera’s elite production and B’s upside preference make acceptance unlikely. The rationale is terse and ignores tiers and player context. The 0.75 acceptance probability is not credible.
